articles.content:
The $1,400 stimulus checks are still going out, but you might find yours is only a partial payment, or delayed.
Sarah Tew/CNET
If you're looking for the third stimulus check to arrive or expecting … [+10590 chars]

articles.title: COVID vaccine FAQs: What's up with side effects? Should you still double-mask? - Minnesota Public Radio News
articles.description: So you've successfully scored a COVID-19 vaccination — or at least an appointment. Congrats! Now what about potential short-term side effects like fever, fatigue and muscle aches? And do you have to keep up that double-masking?
